这次大更，让我对这个游戏有点失望。不仅没有修复之前的匹配问题跟BUG，反而带来了更多的问题。
1.煞笔匹配机制。玩人10把8把红ping房，匹配时间长，游戏体验差
2.bug增多。adada沙雕摇动我平地摇你大爷，玩屠夫经常掉线，卡房也没修复
3.脑残上段机制，玩屠夫3杀7挂你给我保段？玩人我无畏拉满了救了一个人然后拉了两个门出去了你也给我保段？另一把开一台电机加溜3台屠夫你给我掉段？你让我怎么玩，我是闪电侠吗能一边溜屠夫一边修电机一边救队友？
4.两个号也有1000多小时了，从没这么被恶心过。zzz希望你们坚持自己，never mind the scandal and liber，永远不要理会谣言跟中伤，坚持自己的游戏思路。zzz，NMSL

3 часа искать карту ради того что бы нарваться на манька-кемпера. 3000 багов добавляют азарта к игре. Удивляет даже скорость того как разрабы пытаются убрать хотя бы один баг. Платные DLC тоже к месту. Вообщем картина такая разарабы не будут париться насчёт багов но будут переодически вводить в игру платные DLC. Если бы не играл в эту игру с друзьями я бы её сразу же и продал. Из плюсов в этой игре невозможно  ничего отметить просто потому что их здесь нет. Оригинальная идея это максимум на что способна эта игра.

Hier mal meine Meinung zu diesem Spiel. 

Das Prinzip ist gut. 4 Surv. gegen 1 Killer. Die Surv. müssen die Gens machen ,Wärend der Killer versuchen muss Sie davon ab zu halten. 

Was man jedoch daraus gemacht hat ist der letzte dreck. 

Es gibt keine festen Server ,das heißt man kann als Killer in Regionen Lobbys eröffnen ,wo man genau weiß das man dir Surv zu tote leggt. 
Es gibt Bugs ohne ende. Getan dagegen wird nichts,weil man ja lieber an neuen DLC'S arbeitet um denn Profit zu steigern.
Die Camper ,wobei laut entw. ist campen ja eine taktik. Die Tatsache das man "Bouru Time" einführte gegen Camping ist ja mal mehr als lächerlich in mehreren punkten. So muss der surv. schon mal auf einen per verzichten und helfen tut es auch null ,der Killer muss einfach bloß Tunneln und schon war es das. 

Im Endeffekt ist es einfach bloß ein Spiel um Geld zu scheffeln,denn ich hab noch nie ein game gesehen ,wo man so sehr auf die eigene community scheißt.

I haven't gotten many hours in, but enough to come to grips with the gameplay mechanics fully.

Don't bother buying this game if you want to be a killer. 

Matchmaking is ridiculously broken, since it seems based on rank? The issue is, characters have levels and unlock perks. Many players at rank 20 (the lowest rank) have maxed out their characters to level 50 and have level 3 perk sets. So, as a noob, you will be matched against players that have hundreds of hours in the game. 

There is no way to prevent groups of survivors from using a 3rd party VOIP. Combined with the "Survive with Friends" feature, you will often find you are matched against groups that are using voice chat to coordinate. 

Because of those two features, individual survivor skills are very, very strong compared to the killer. Abilities like Premonition & Sprint Burst allow survivors to tell when the killer is nearby, and get the vital head start needed to get to their friends (who, as I have a sneaking suspicion in a fair amount of the matches I have played, are all coordinating on VOIP). Survivors are able to utilize environmental features to "infinitely" outpace the killer, meaning that (again, as a noob) there is a potential you will never, ever be able to catch even one survivor. 


Matchmaking as a survivor can take quite a long time (up to 20 minutes), because the players that WOULD be playing killers (EG me) either have swapped to playing a survivor as a "main" or straight up quit the game -- I have learned these things from perusing forum posts. 

The slant towards survivors is so heavy that, as a killer, you will notice survivors don't hide. They group together. They taunt you, repair 2-3 gens at a time, utilize the infamous "infinite jukes" to frustrate you -- and, if you catch a survivor, and hook them, rest assured that the other survivors are behind a nearby window or tree waiting for you to walk away so they can unhook the poor player you just caught and heal eachother (utilizing the neato healing perks survivors get)... 

Of course, you might not even get to a hook. Survivors can blow all the hooks on the map out, leaving you to haul your kill to the basement. And when you get to the building, you will find two survivors there "bodyblocking" you -- standing side by side in the doorway. Of course, they will be able to heal eachother, while you're left to drop your prey.. at which point they will heal him and run away. 


I had fun playing the first 20-25 hours while I was still coming to grips with the gameplay. The first 10 hours were an absolute blast, and depending on your "value for money" that might be enough to purchase it outright. But once I understood how the game worked, I saw how completely biased the game has become since it's release (gleaned from patch notes) and it has lost all fun since then. 

I'm not sure if I'll continue playing after I write this review. I bought a copy for my sister at the same time. Maybe she can get me to play. But I doubt it.

Tried to play a game with my friend multiple times as the survivor but close to the beginning of the game I would get randomly dced and the "Escaped" screen would appear saying I escaped the killer. This is obvously false since my friend was still playing and would just tell me that I dced. Was only able to go through one round without dcing but the rest I could never finish the game. This has been a bug for a few patches now and the devs refuse to answer any questions about it. Don't waste your money.

The most terrifying game I've played so far. And yes, I don't play much horror games, but this one was worth it. With only several hours so far in this game [because my friends and I can't play as often at the time as we want], I can easily say I was terrified at first and still am. 

The thrill of the game, the sounds, the music, it all fits in. I didn't know that I could make sounds which you can compare to an eagle, and I don't think my friend knew that either. Also, my characters should know more of hiding in the closet, it takes me already 18 years - Oh wait...

Now to be for real. 
Its a fun game to know how your friends really see you when you would try and kill them. It brings the most evil-side of us to be shown and it shows how much of a cowards we can really be. It's terrifying but it's statisfying.
 
I really recommend it if you don't have it yet. A must!

Horror in games (and films) is too often characterised by jump scares; shocking, startling events designed to trigger a fight-or-flight response. Dead by Daylight, to its credit, eschews these in favour of real horror--a gradual increase in tension resulting from the unshakeable sense of impending doom. That it manages to do this in an asymmetrical competitive action game is what is truly impressive about it.
Dead by Daylight features two teams--four survivors and one killer--and pits them against one another in a battle for all the marbles: The four survivors need to repair five generators to power the gates which will allow them to escape. The killer needs to find the survivors, knock them down, put them on hooks and then sacrifice them to their otherworldly gods. The odds are skewed heavily in favour of the invincible killer, and as a result playing Dead by Daylight as a survivor can be a nerve-rattling, sweat-inducing, terrifying experience.
After queuing into a game with three other survivors, Dead by Daylight puts you in one of several eerie horror environments--a dilapidated farm, a run-down manor, a rickety junkyard--and tells you, very simply, to fix the generators to escape. When you find the generators, you then need to repair them--a painstakingly slow process, where you hold the left mouse button down while crouching in front of it. If you're alone, repairing the generator can take more than a minute. As you crouch next to the very noisy generator, the game will throw skill-tests at you by way of a rotating bar--if you fail the QTE, the generator will backfire. This creates a noisy explosion, and the killer is visually alerted to the location of the backfire, turning you into a target.
If the killer does find you (and he probably will) your options are limited. If you have a flashlight you can blind him temporarily, but your best bet is to run away. The killer moves faster than you can run, maintaining the traditional horror movie 'ominous walk', but you can slow him down by leaping through windows, or pushing down pallets to block his path. You want to put as many of these obstacles in between the two of you as possible as you flee for your life.
Fortunately for the survivors, a sixth sense mechanic alerts them to the presence of a nearby killer--the closer the killer is, the faster your survivor's heart beats. Unfortunately the sound is obscured by generator revving as you repair it. When 90% repaired, the generator nearly drowns out the heartbeat entirely, forcing you to rely solely on your eyes to see the killer.
When you play as the killer, you're able to see all the map's generators at all times, allowing you to patrol them. If any of them are making noise, you know at least one survivor has been working on it, and you can hunt for signs that the others are nearby. Panicked survivors will sprint away, leaving scratches on nearby walls and breaks in the grass, and you can follow these markings to find your prey. Once you find your prey you chop them down, pick them up and put them on a hook, sacrificing them to your god after 60 seconds.
The scoring system initially encourages players to create exciting gameplay opportunities by rewarding risky play. Survivors who engage in lengthy, drawn out chases escaping the killer will earn more points for their boldness, and you can rack up the points by rescuing other survivors who have been captured but not yet sacrificed. As a killer you're rewarded for killing more of the survivors, although a single sacrifice is counted as a victory. Inevitably though, this scoring system leads to immersion-breaking actions like exploiting the killer's slow movement past obstacles, as survivors earn huge points by taunting their hunter.
 
Another problem for Dead by Daylight is its matchmaking system. The game is entirely peer-to-peer hosted, with the killer hosting the survivors at all times. Unfortunately there's no way to tell where in the world the killer is or whether they're capable of hosting five people in a game until you're playing. There's no ping indicator and no regional matchmaking, so you have to roll the dice each time you join a new server--and if you crap out, you'll warp around the game world barely able to work out what's going on. Further, there's no group-based matchmaking, so you can't queue with friends. This results in players lobby-hopping until they are grouped with friends, which is a terrible experience for all involved.
Dead by Daylight executes the concept of a competitive horror game well, but only to a point. As players become more familiar with both roles, the horror dissipates and they begin to play for the competitive element alone. The poor matchmaking and the highly exploitable scoring system make Dead by Daylight less competitive than it should be, resulting in gameplay which doesn't resemble the horror experience it sets out to be.

"Игра очень даже доставляет,особенно если играть с друзьями,геймплей за выживших и маньяков одинаково хорош,хотя на самом деле нет,последние обновления меня мягко говоря не радуют,разработчикам нужно более плавно настраивать балланс как самих карт-мест для дефа ,так и самих перков выживших,которые более безполезны,чем умения маньяков,решают только командные действия,но в принципе весело и пока не надоедает,хотя хочется больше разнообразия,например той же кастомизации или новых режимов!"-2016
А теперь то,что стало с игрой спустя почти 5 лет-по сути основная концепция осталась одна и та же-никаких тебе новых режимов,пати маньяков,поддержки модов и прочего.
Баланс идет лишь в сторону нерфов и иногда редких,но бафов,в основном лишь маньяков,а сурвам если повезет апнут раз в 3-4 месяца какой нибудь перк на пару процентов,чтобы не ныли).Появилась отличная возможность разбивать стены,которые добавили практически возле каждого окна и теперь мансы от маньяков превращаются просто не во что!)"Коллапс" конечно круто.но добавьте еще один люк на локации,а то ни как не убежать,либо отодвиньте спавн ворот дальше друг от друга,плиз!)Кастомизации хотя бы дохренища,спасибо,именно этого и хотел,серьезно,спасибо.
Архивы и Баттл-пасс тоже годнота,хоть какой-то стимул играть в это.
Поиск лобби,особенно за мана довольно долгий,если ты не в прайм-тайме где-нибудь вечерком,хотя если рангом пониже,то находит вроде быстро.но это не точно.
Все еще жду Слендермена,пора бы его уже завести,да и много кого еще,хотя в этом плане разработчики конечно молодцы-выпускают новые главы раз в 3 месяца,контент как говорится на регулярной основе.
Стабильный все же онлайн-30-50к в среднем каждый день означает,что игра пока живет,чего нельзя сказать о других похожих проектах.
Как я и писал раннее-не хватает масштабности:новых больших локаций с возможностью переходов между ними после выполнения различных действий как например в Deceit и Friday 13 или каких-то новых режимов,а не банальной починкой генераторов с симулятором нажатий Mouse 1,современной графики с хваленными RTX и прочей дребеденью,ну или хотя бы возможностью убрать мыло и скачать HD текстуры высокого разрешения,как это например реализовано в WOT,тогда в плюсе будут и графо д р о ч е р ы и калькуляторщики.

[b]   Completely regressing game ever. [/b]

I don't want to put dislike this game in spite of meeting here 2000 hours  but I was forced to do that and i have been waiting such a long time to give an opportunity devs make a game better but NOT, it's not fun to suffer here anymore! I could write a book right now: How game is good or bad of course all video games have advantages and disadvantages but not every game has an opportunity been regularly updated to keep pace with developments in game industry. Rather than being get better, it just get worse.
      Well, first of all i think developers're so much lost in the world of wealth that for their, updating also the opinion of players and wealth become confused. What we have right now? The game was release in June 14, 2016 it's been 3 years since after release. What do I mean by that? Look, I don't mean to upset you, but i do. I still find in the game bugs, bad connection with other players despite the fact that I have really good interent service i have to suffer from this. If compare with other games I have never had connection problems expect Mortal Kombat 9 but this game had only 2 or 3 time updates for all time and not so cool for PC-gamers (that's why MK9 hadn't tones of update i can understand it)  more so I assume those bad reviews have to do game better and my HOPE never dies in vain.
      All you got to do is make a game more playable. Noone won't to waste his time by spending an increased amount of time in the waiting rooms than playing the real-match. Not to mention that fact what as the Killer your waiting time is increase almost in 2 times.
      A few words about Matchmaking. Worst Matchmaking i have ever seen in my virtual life. The rank system is brainwashing. Having you 8 rank, 4 rank or 1 rank it's all the same. All players're not equal. Can I say one thing? The things you own end up owning you. Never up your rank more than 5 because in 4 to 1 players could be even worse. You can prevent misunderstandings and hurt feelings. It is inexplicable - WHY? Why does this happen? I can explain  B A D   M A T C H M A K I N G   S Y S T E M!  Finally, it's not fun to recover your previous rank every single month. Just increase the rank numbers. TBH
      They've figured out how to brainwash people that play their game by doing more costumes any additional items. That's all well and good, makes everything better, but only in the form of visual observation, not for comfortable game.
      DLC  - in this game is amazing to additional content. Every chapter is better than previous. I cannot say anything bad about DLC 10/10.
      In conclusion, that's your decision, of course play this game or not. But right now I do not recommend play this game for beginners and who has been playing for a long time, he already all knows.
   
      The floor is yours. 
      Thanks for reading my review.

Este juego es una joya, un multijugador excepcional. Tiene unas bases muy simples pero, por increíble que parezca, abre la puerta a un montonazo de posibilidades. Tiene horas y horas de rejugabilidad y puede producirte variedad de emociones. Tensión cuando sientes cerca al asesino, alegría cuando pasa al lado tuyo y te ignora completamente, furia cuando caes en una de sus trampas, satisfacción por el trabajo en equipo, y como asesino también muchas más. Lo único que tiene de malo este juego es el "matchmaking", aunque algunas veces funciona estupendamente y su mala optimización. Yo lo juego en un portátil y no me disgustan estos fallos gráficos, pero si tienes un ordenador potente no tienes de nada de lo que preocuparte. Muchos juegos desearían dar esta diversión por solo 20€...
什么都好，希望解决外挂和等待时间长的问题。

Это все!
Создатели, пожалуйста уровновешти выжившего .
Спасибо!

** Killer จะเดินไวไปไหนนน **

ระบบโครตกากครับบอกเลย พัฒนาเกมได้แย่มากๆทำเกมออกมากรุณาสนเรื่องปิงของผู้เล่นด้วยนะครับ ควรจะบอกสถานะค่าปิงของทั้งผู้ล่าและผู้ถูกล่า ไม่ใช่มาปิดข้อมูลแบบนี้ ปิดทุกๆข้อมูลเลย แย่มากครับ ผมให้ 0.5/10 ครับ เสียดายเงินที่ซื้อมามากครับ เดี่ยวจะแจ้งVACคืนเงินละครับเท่าไหร่ก็เอาครับดีกว่าไม่ได้ ผู้พัฒนาเกมดูถูกผู้เล่นเกินไปบอกเลย เปิดเผยข้อมูลส่วนผู้เล่นบางส่วนก็ยังดี นี่อะไรปิดหมดและเปลี่ยนภาษากลางคันก็ไม่ได้ ตามนั้นครับ 0.5 /10 0.5ให้กับตัวเกมที่โอเคอยู่ นอกนั้นไม่ครับ ฝากถึงผู้สร้างและผู้พัฒนานะครับ

Игра не плохая но иногда встречаются баги например застревание в текстурах или вылет за карту как за маньяка так и за выжившего. Ну а вобщем можно хорошо провести время играя в эту игру.

Sehr schönes Spiel, es macht als Mensch sehr viel Spaß vor dem Monster zu flüchten. Das Rang-System wurde auch gut überlegt! Man findet zwar nicht so viele Matches, da nicht so viele Monster spielen, aber nach paar Minuten geht das. :)

DAUMEN HOCH! :P

这真的是我遇见最渣的游戏，没有之一，没有独立的服务器，屠夫是主机导致有时候游戏体验超级差，因为你正在紧张的跟屠夫玩的时候各种闪现 撞墙，游戏互动也各种延迟，想要点夹子结果闪现踩到夹子，当然如果屠夫网络好那还好说。另外这游戏BUG很多，人类在BUG上无限对屠夫嘲讽，拆个钩子 结果掉地底下了，压个板子结果屠夫卡在板子里了，呵呵 还有卡在树根上的 我真的是服气。最气人的就是 现在连游戏都玩不了 ，因为检测外挂的进度条没有满就自动进去了，一直说有人使用外挂，要真的是外挂被检测那真是太好了，然而还是一堆微调的挂在那装大手子怎么投诉都没用。
_____________________________________________________________
两年之后默默的换了好评，不管怎么说这个游戏公司对中国玩家的重视大家都有目共睹，虽然已经快两年没玩了但是偶尔上线那种紧张刺激的感觉又回来了，虽然很多新的传承技能没有时间学，但是意大利炮还是意大利炮，那时候为了屠夫不拔线不敢带手电然后屠夫一准备四个人瞬间换角色带手电，那时候为了不跟护士玩愣是四个人一起拔线掉到4 5段，其实到现在还是很不喜欢护士，我唯一抗拒的屠夫。

Art is about exploring all human emotions and feelings , as survivor you are scared paranoid looking over your shoulder every few second to make sure you are not being chased . As killer you are powerful and fast making you feel like an actual predator chasing down your prey , as the prey you job is to not be seen and stay alive , as the hunter it's your job to hunt down and sacrifice your prey to some hidden boss or god or something (you can also kill said prey).

Sad truth of the current state of the game is that there will be a lot of times where you have fun ,  times that you will have a jump scare due to audio or the killer or the generator blowing up , catching that annoying survivor with that flashlight (run Franklin ) . But most of the time you are going to be numb , numb to killer bullshit , numb to flashlights , numb to survivors speed boosts , numb to everything the game has to offer . 

The game has dedicated servers so lag is your problem now .
The devs regularly update and change the game so the game doesn't stay stale(you get used to the new meta shit very fast ) . 
Like all modern games there is a chance you can run into a bug or feature that is a bug .

Key to this game is balance

If you want to play this game I would recommend a balance , play both killer and survivor , learn from survivors as you play killer ,learn how to dodge and weave from them . From killers learn that they do not always see where survivors hide , learn from your failures and improve your play style .
